location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'EAST COAST OF ARABIA SHOWING SAUDI ARABIA-BAHRAIN PIPE LINE'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: A pencil number enclosed in a circle is located in the top right hand corner of the recto of the folio.Materials: Parchment sheetDimensions: 450mm x 574mm

mods.abstract: Map showing the east coast of Saudi Arabia, Bahrein [Bahrain] Island, Fasht ad Dibal [Fasht ad Dībal] and the Persian Gulf across to the west coast of Qatar.The proposed route of the pipeline, from Ras Tanurah to the Bahrein Refinery through Edh Dhahran [Aẓ-Ẓahrān] and Al Khobar is marked with a blue line.Soundings are marked on the map in fathoms.
